text: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Sesungguhnya salatku, ibadahku, hidupku dan matiku hanyalah untuk Allah, Tuhan seluruh alam
